price: Kuma lalle sunã ɗaukar kãyan nauyinsu da waɗansu nauyãyan kãya tãre da kãyan nauyinsu, kuma lalle zã a tambaye su a Rãnar ¡iyama game da abin da suka kasance sunã ƙirƙirãwa na ƙarya.
arabic: وَلَيَحۡمِلُنَّ أَثۡقَالَهُمۡ وَأَثۡقَالٗا مَّعَ أَثۡقَالِهِمۡۖ وَلَيُسۡـَٔلُنَّ يَوۡمَ ٱلۡقِيَٰمَةِ عَمَّا كَانُواْ يَفۡتَرُونَ

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: walayaḥmilunna athqālahum wa-athqālan maʿa athqālihim walayus'alunna yawma al-qiyāmati ʿammā kānū yaftarūna
translations: and surely they will be questioned
